languages.text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wanted to please..."
"We did not mean to offend! We only wanted to please..."
"We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."
"We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."
"We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."
"We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

languages.text: “我们无疑冒犯！我们仅仅是想取悦……”
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: “我们无疑冒犯！我们仅仅是想取悦……”

languages.text: 「侮辱するつもりはなかったのです！ただ、あなたを喜ばせたかっただけで…」
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: 「侮辱するつもりはなかったのです！ただ、あなたを喜ばせたかっただけで…」

languages.text: «¡No pretendíamos faltarle al respeto! Tan solo queríamos complacerle...».
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: «¡No pretendíamos faltarle al respeto! Tan solo queríamos complacerle...».

languages.text: "Sizi gücendirmek istememiştik! Yalnızca memnun etmek istemiştik..."
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi gücendirmek istememiştik! Yalnızca memnun etmek istemiştik..."

languages.text: « Nous ne voulions pas vous offenser ! Nous cherchions seulement à vous divertir... »
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne voulions pas vous offenser ! Nous cherchions seulement à vous divertir... »

languages.text: "Wir wollten Euch nicht beleidigen! Wir wollten Euch nur eine Freude ..."
languages.original_text: "We did not mean to offend! We only wished to please..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wollten Euch nicht beleidigen! Wir wollten Euch nur eine Freude ..."
